Authors:
Jonatan Cristian Campillo Brocal, Maria Dolores Chacon
Verdu, Patricia Lucas Elio, Antonio Sanchez Amat
Title:
Distribution in microbial genomes of genes similar to lodA
and goxA which encode a novel family of quinoproteins with amino acid
oxidase activity.
Keywords:
L-amino acid oxidase, quinone cofactor, Post-translational
modification, Lysine oxidase, Glycine oxidase.
